name: The Defector
detailed_description:
Streaming Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


#label_about_the_series

The Cold War's greatest unsolved mystery: in 1967 Prime Minister Holt disappeared without a trace. Discover what really happened in this tense conspiracy thriller, part one of an anthology series of highend movies, free on Steam.
about_the_game: The Cold War's greatest unsolved mystery: in 1967 Prime Minister Holt disappeared without a trace. Discover what really happened in this tense conspiracy thriller, part one of an anthology series of highend movies, free on Steam.
short_description: The Cold War's greatest unsolved mystery: in 1967 Prime Minister Holt disappeared without a trace. Discover what really happened in this tense conspiracy thriller, part one of an anthology series of highend movies, free on Steam.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

mac_requirements.minimum:
